      • weightedTransform

        public static double[] weightedTransform(double[] input,
                         double[] targetCurve,
                         double k)
        Transform each data point by weighting the square of the difference between the original data point and a target value, divided by the target value raised to a constant power k.

        When k=0, absolute weighting is used. When k=2, Poisson weighting is used. When k=2, relative weighting is used.

        Parameters:
        input - the original data.
        targetCureve - the target/ideal/correct values for the region of the curve in question
        k - a constant that determines the type of weighting.
        Returns:
        the square root data.
        See Also:
        http://graphpad.com/guides/prism/6/curve-fitting/reg_how_weigting_works.htm

      • getData

        public double[] getData()
        Returns the processed data.
        Returns:
        the data after all processing has taken place.
